body: @tangrogo It's also a hentai site, who cares if this is a 17 year old boy and a 24 year old man? jerk off or fuck off

@tangrogo This isn't a meaningless ship, quite the opposite, and if you don't like it, don't read it, it's for those of us who do like it.
It's a ship with a lot of sense, with a lot of canon base, and above all it is the most popular of Zenitsu.

I love how people often love to point finger at MHA fandom because it's such a meme, yet Demon Slayer has much worse fan base. Here's 2 characters that barely shared more than 10 lines but got shipped, and for those on Twitter, it's also a ship between an adult and a kid
